title: [Stone Structure, Bedroom]
description: Several rusted coiled metal springs are scattered around the room, which is lit with a handful of candles on the floor and moonlight streaming from several holes in the thatched ceiling.  Underneath a broken window framed with tattered curtains, a makeshift table is pushed up against the wall, its length filled with pestles, mortars, liquid-filled bottles, jars of herbs and flowers, and small wooden bowls.  A small wood-framed mirror leans up against the far wall, surrounded by growth pushing up through the ground.

Several rusted coiled metal springs are scattered around the room, which is lit with daylight streaming from several holes in the thatched ceiling.  Underneath a broken window framed with tattered curtains, a makeshift table is pushed up against the wall, its length filled with pestles, mortars, liquid-filled bottles, jars of herbs and flowers, and small wooden bowls.  A small wood-framed mirror leans up against the far wall, surrounded by growth pushing up through the ground.
